summary: Completed comprehensive testing of GuessIt Football Prediction Platform. All backend APIs and frontend functionality working correctly. 100% success rate on backend testing and frontend UI/UX testing.
passed_tests: Backend API health endpoint (GET /api/health) returns healthy status
Auth me endpoint properly returns 401 when not authenticated
Predictions endpoint properly requires authentication (401 without auth)
Homepage loads correctly with dark theme, promo banner, tabs, league filters, and match cards
Login page renders correctly at /login with email/password form and Google sign-in button
Register page renders correctly at /register with registration form and password validation
Theme toggle switches between dark and light mode
League filter chips are clickable and filter matches
Vote buttons (1, X, 2) are visible and clickable on match cards
Form fields are functional with proper validation
Interactive elements respond properly to user actions
